00025 #ifndef _GLIBHALCALLBACK_H
00026 #define _GLIBHALCALLBACK_H
00027 
00028 #include <dbus/dbus-glib.h>
00029 
00030 typedef void (*HalDeviceAdded) (const gchar *udi);
00031 typedef void (*HalDeviceRemoved) (const gchar *udi);
00032 typedef void (*HalDeviceNewCapability) (const gchar *udi, const gchar *capability);
00033 typedef void (*HalDeviceLostCapability) (const gchar *udi, const gchar *capability);
00034 typedef void (*HalDevicePropertyModified) (const gchar *udi, const gchar *key, gboolean removed, gboolean added);
00035 typedef void (*HalDeviceCondition) (const gchar *udi, const gchar *name, const gchar *detail);
00036 
00038 typedef struct {
00039     HalDeviceAdded          device_added;
00040     HalDeviceRemoved        device_removed;
00041     HalDeviceNewCapability      device_new_capability;
00042     HalDeviceLostCapability     device_lost_capability;
00043     HalDevicePropertyModified   device_property_modified;
00044     HalDeviceCondition      device_condition;
00045 } HalFunctions;
00046 
00048 typedef struct {
00049     gboolean            device_added;
00050     gboolean            device_removed;
00051     gboolean            device_new_capability;
00052     gboolean            device_lost_capability;
00053     gboolean            device_condition;
00054 } HalRegistered;
00055 
00057 typedef struct {
00058     DBusGProxy          *device_added;
00059     DBusGProxy          *device_removed;
00060     DBusGProxy          *device_new_capability;
00061     DBusGProxy          *device_lost_capability;
00062     GPtrArray           *device_condition;
00063     GPtrArray           *device_property_modified;
00064 } HalConnections;
00065 
00067 typedef struct {
00068     gchar               udi[128];
00069     DBusGProxy          *proxy;
00070 } UdiProxy;

00072 gboolean glibhal_callback_init (void);
00073 gboolean glibhal_callback_shutdown (void);

00075 gboolean glibhal_method_device_removed (HalDeviceRemoved callback);
00076 gboolean glibhal_method_device_added (HalDeviceAdded callback);
00077 gboolean glibhal_method_device_new_capability (HalDeviceNewCapability callback);
00078 gboolean glibhal_method_device_lost_capability (HalDeviceLostCapability callback);
00079 gboolean glibhal_method_device_property_modified (HalDevicePropertyModified callback);
00080 gboolean glibhal_method_device_condition (HalDeviceCondition callback);
00081

00083 gboolean glibhal_watch_add_device_condition (const gchar *udi);
00084 
00085 gboolean glibhal_watch_remove_device_removed ();
00086 gboolean glibhal_watch_remove_device_added ();
00087 gboolean glibhal_watch_remove_device_new_capability ();
00088 gboolean glibhal_watch_remove_device_lost_capability ();
